guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Demonstrate a Potential Impact on Pharmacokinetic Properties Only]: Tamoxifen - CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166316022
recommendations.population: Affected subgroup: CYP2D6 intermediate or poor metabolizers

text.html: "Results in lower systemic active metabolite concentrations. The impact of CYP2D6 intermediate or poor metabolism on efficacy is not well established."
